title: Canton of Zürich
summary: The canton of Zürich (German: Kanton Zürich ; Romansh: Chantun Turitg) is a Swiss canton in the northeastern part of the country. With a population of 1,553,423 (as of 31 December 2020), it is the most populous canton in the country.[2] Its capital is the city of Zürich. The official language is German. The local Swiss German dialect, called Züritüütsch, is commonly spoken.
